alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 9:28PM EDT until April 12 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton affecting Gibson County. .Minor flooding continues on the Patoka River near Princeton. The river is forecast to hold nearly steady through the weekend. It is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday April 12. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning April 12. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Flooding affects mainly farmland. Seasonal camping trailers closest to the river become inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 18.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to hold nearly steady through Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning April 12. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
